text: Ta ne vvazhayutʹ krim tomu shcho tsey khto sliduyutʹ za vashoyu relihiyeyu." Skazhitʹ, virne kerivnytstvo ye BOZHE kerivnytstvo." Yakshcho vony zayavlyayutʹ shcho vony mayutʹ te zhe kerivnytstvo, abo sperechayutʹsya z vamy pro vashoho Lorda, kazhutʹ, "Vsya charivnistʹ ye u BOZHIY rutsi; Vin daruye tse na whomever Vin wills." BOH ye Bounteous, Omniscient
